MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY4 postcode area of Cowdenbeath, affecting properties in Viewfield Terrace and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have arrived onsite and investigated the fault. We have found an underground cable fault on Viewfield Terrace and due to the repairs required, we now expect your supply to be restored by 4.30am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:11PM on Friday 23 October 2020.
